title: Atomic layer deposition of Ru nanoclusters on Ba–LaCeOx: a highly efficient catalyst for ammonia synthesis under mild conditions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00350K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kaiying Wang, Baitang Jin, Xiaoqing He, Xinhua Liang
Uniform ∼1.0 nm metallic ruthenium (Ru) nanoclusters on Ba–LaCeOx particles prepared by atomic layer deposition demonstrated high catalytic performance for ammonia synthesis.
